description: A selector that contains values, a scope name, and an operator that relates the scope name and values. This is currently only used in ResourceQuota.

operator.description: Represents a scope's relationship to a set of values. Valid operators are In, NotIn, Exists, DoesNotExist. When scope is one of 'Terminating', 'NotTerminating', 'BestEffort', 'NotBestEffort', the operator can only be 'Exists'.

scopeName.description: The name of the scope that the selector applies to.

values.description: An array of string values. If the operator is In or NotIn, the values array must be non-empty. If the operator is Exists or DoesNotExist, the values array must be empty. This array is replaced during a strategic merge patch.
